    void
    create(String title, MovieType type, Language lang, MovieAgeCategory ageCat, String synopsis, String director, int runTimeMins, ArrayList<String> cast, LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate)
    CREATE a new Movie and add it into the database file Attributes are validated before creation If attributes are not allowed, throw error and do nothing If Database file exist, existing records are read and new Movie object is aopended before saving If Database file does not exist, Movie object will be written to a new file and saved

  • Method Details

    • create

      public void create(String title, MovieType type, Language lang, MovieAgeCategory ageCat, String synopsis, String director, int runTimeMins, ArrayList<String> cast, LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate)
      CREATE a new Movie and add it into the database file Attributes are validated before creation If attributes are not allowed, throw error and do nothing If Database file exist, existing records are read and new Movie object is aopended before saving If Database file does not exist, Movie object will be written to a new file and saved
      Parameters:
      title - This movie's title
      type - This movie's type
      movieAgeCategory - This movie's ageCategory
      synopsis - This movie's synopsis
      director - This movie's director
      duration - This movie's duration
      cast - This movie's list of cast
      reviews - This Movie's list of rating and reviews
      movieStartDate - This movie's start date
      movieEndDate - This movie's end date

    • read

      public ArrayList<Movie> read()
      READ and return every Movies in the Database file
      Returns:
      Movie Return list of Movies if found, else empty list

    • readByID

      public Movie readByID(int valueToSearch)
      READ and return every Movie of a given ID in the Database file
      Parameters:
      valueToSearch - Id of movie to search for
      Returns:
      Movie Return Movie if found, else null object

    • readByAttribute

      public ArrayList<Movie> readByAttribute(int col, Object valueToSearch)
      READ and return every Movie based on a certain value of a given attribute in the Database file
      Parameters:
      col - Given attribute to be check for (based on constant as defined)
      valueToSearch - Value of given attribute to search for
      Returns:
      Movie Return list of Movies if any, else empty list

    • readAvailableMovies

      public ArrayList<Movie> readAvailableMovies()
      READ and return every Movie that are still available for booking in the Database file
      Returns:
      Movie Return list of Movies if any, else empty list

    • updateMovie

      public void updateMovie(int col, int id, Object newValue)
      UPDATE a Movie's attribute based on a given movie's id in Database file Attributes are check for validity before updates If invalid throw error and do nothing else update and sae movie to database
      Parameters:
      col - Attribute of movie to update
      id - ID of Movie to search for
      newValue - New value of Movie's attribute

    • deleteById

      public void deleteById(int id)
      Delete a Movie in the Database file, based on the ID attribute passed
      Parameters:
      id - ID of Movie for deletion

    • getLastId

      public int getLastId()
      Return the ID of the last Movie in the Database field
      Returns:
      int ID of last Movie in the Database

    • replaceExistingFile

      public void replaceExistingFile(String filename, ArrayList<Movie> data)
      Overwrite Database file with new data of list of Movie
      Parameters:
      filename - Filename to check for
      data - New ArrayList of Movies to be written to the file
